title: Music of the Early Printers
content:
Type isn’t just for alphabets.  
 [Music of the Early Printers.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905053625/http:/www.amaranthpublishing.com/Printers.htm)

 [‹ Untitled Book Store NYC is now a shoe store](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905053625/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17890 "Go to previous forum topic") [Italics: What characters stay "roman"? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905053625/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17869 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nick Shinn

comments.content:
Interesting find. Thank you for sharing.

.lazyeye.
Wonderful! Printing and early music: two of my favourite things in one place.
